resources.string: My existence is a miracle. / 我存在就是奇迹
I allow emotions to flow freely. / 我允许情绪自在流动
There is no danger in the moment, I am full of strength. / 当下没有危险，我充满力量
I love and am loved. / 我爱着，也被爱着
I am willing to reveal my truth. / 我愿意袒露真实
Inspiration comes to me, I do not have to expect it. / 灵感降临与我，我不必期待
I have the courage to follow my heart.
Things will unfold at precisely the right time.
I will be present in all the moments that this day brings.
